#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define s(x) scanf("%d", &x)

using namespace std;

int fact(int x)
{
	int ans =1;
	for(int i=1;i<=x;i++)
	{
		ans *= i;
	}
	return ans;
}

int main()
{
	int i,j,k,m,n,t;
	
	cin >> t;
	
	while(t--)
	{
		map <int,int> m;
		for(i =0;i<11;i++)
		{
			cin >> k;
			m[k]++;
		}
		
		cin >> k;
		map <int,int>::reverse_iterator it;	
		
		i =0;
		int ans =1;
		
		for(it = m.rbegin(); it != m.rend() && k > 0 ; it++)
		{
			if(k < it->second)
			{
				ans = fact(it->second)/ (fact(it->second - k)* fact(k));				
			}
			
			k = k - it->second;
			//cout << it->first << " "<< it->second << " " <<endl;
		}
		
		cout << ans <<endl;
			
	}
}
